Package com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RailLogic
    Handles how a minecart travels on top of a rail
    RailLogicAir
    Handles movement of a minecart that is flying through the air
    RailLogicGround
    Handles the rail logic of a minecart sliding on the ground
    RailLogicHorizontal
    Horizontal rail logic that does not operate on the vertical motion and position
    RailLogicSloped
    Handles minecart movement on sloped rails
    RailLogicVertical  
    RailLogicVerticalSlopeDown
    Handles the rail logic of a sloped rail with a vertical rail above
    RailLogicVerticalSlopeUp
    Handles the rail logic for a vertical rail to sloped rail
    This is a stub: This should eventually replace the teleport logic in the Minecart members' move info
